languages.text: "Когда имеешь дело с ксеносами, стоит быть готовыми к манифестациям всякой зловещей мистики. Среди хладных торговцев есть целая каста специалистов, умеющих зашептывать артефакты нелюдей и изгонять их духов. Может, обратимся к ним?"

"When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who use rituals to expel spirits from xeno-artefacts. Perhaps we should ask these xenowhisperers?"
languages.original_text: "Когда имеешь дело с ксеносами, стоит быть готовыми к манифестациям всякой зловещей мистики. Среди хладных торговцев есть целая каста специалистов, умеющих зашептывать артефакты нелюдей и изгонять их духов. Может, обратимся к ним?"

traits.locale_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Trades who can whisper at the abhumans' artefacts and expel the spirits out of them. Perhaps we should ask them?"

"When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Trades who can whisper at the abhumans' artefacts and expel the spirits out of them. Perhaps we should ask them?"

languages.text: “和异形打交道的时候，我们应该随时准备应对各种不祥的神秘现象。我认识一群冷市贸易专家，他们可以与异形造物交流，驱逐居住在其中的幽灵。也许我们应该问问他们的意见？”
languages.original_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who can whisper at xeno-artefacts to expel the spirits residing within. Perhaps we should ask them?"

traits.locale_text: “和异形打交道的时候，我们应该随时准备应对各种不祥的神秘现象。我认识一群冷市贸易专家，他们可以与异形造物交流，驱逐居住在其中的幽灵。也许我们应该问问他们的意见？”

languages.text: «Cuando se trata con xenos, uno debe estar preparado para la manifestación de todo tipo de misterios ominosos. Hay toda una casta de especialistas entre los Comerciantes Fríos que pueden susurrar a los xenoartefactos para expulsar a los espíritus que residen en su interior. Quizá deberíamos preguntarles».
languages.original_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who can whisper at xeno-artefacts to expel the spirits residing within. Perhaps we should ask them?"

traits.locale_text: «Cuando se trata con xenos, uno debe estar preparado para la manifestación de todo tipo de misterios ominosos. Hay toda una casta de especialistas entre los Comerciantes Fríos que pueden susurrar a los xenoartefactos para expulsar a los espíritus que residen en su interior. Quizá deberíamos preguntarles».

languages.text: 「ゼノを相手にするときは、あらゆる種類の不吉な謎の兆候に対処する備えをしなければなりません。コールド・トレーダーには、ゼノのアーティファクトに囁きかけて中にいる精霊を追い出す専門の階級があります。彼らに尋ねてみるのはどうでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who can whisper at xeno-artefacts to expel the spirits residing within. Perhaps we should ask them?"

traits.locale_text: 「ゼノを相手にするときは、あらゆる種類の不吉な謎の兆候に対処する備えをしなければなりません。コールド・トレーダーには、ゼノのアーティファクトに囁きかけて中にいる精霊を追い出す専門の階級があります。彼らに尋ねてみるのはどうでしょうか？」

languages.text: « Quand on a affaire à des xénos, il faut s'attendre à toutes sortes de manifestations inexpliquées et de mystères inquiétants. Il existe, parmi les adeptes du Commerce Froid, une caste de spécialistes capables de parler aux xéno-artefacts pour en chasser les esprits. Peut-être devrions-nous faire appel à eux ? »
languages.original_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who can whisper at xeno-artefacts to expel the spirits residing within. Perhaps we should ask them?"

traits.locale_text: « Quand on a affaire à des xénos, il faut s'attendre à toutes sortes de manifestations inexpliquées et de mystères inquiétants. Il existe, parmi les adeptes du Commerce Froid, une caste de spécialistes capables de parler aux xéno-artefacts pour en chasser les esprits. Peut-être devrions-nous faire appel à eux ? »

languages.text: "Im Umgang mit Xenos sollte man auf die Manifestation allerlei finsterer Geheimnisse gefasst sein. Es gibt unter den Kalthändlern eine ganze Kaste von Spezialisten, die Xeno-Artefakten Dinge zuflüstern können, um die Geister darin zu vertreiben. Vielleicht sollten wir sie fragen?"
languages.original_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who can whisper at xeno-artefacts to expel the spirits residing within. Perhaps we should ask them?"

traits.locale_text: "Im Umgang mit Xenos sollte man auf die Manifestation allerlei finsterer Geheimnisse gefasst sein. Es gibt unter den Kalthändlern eine ganze Kaste von Spezialisten, die Xeno-Artefakten Dinge zuflüstern können, um die Geister darin zu vertreiben. Vielleicht sollten wir sie fragen?"

languages.text: "Zenolarla karşı karşıyayken her türden uğursuz esrarın tezahürüne hazırlıklı olmak gerekir. İçlerinde varlıklarını sürdüren ruhları defetmek için zeno eserlerine fısıldayabilen Soğuk Tacirler arasında koskoca bir uzman sınıfı mevcut. Belki de onlardan fikir almalıyız."
languages.original_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who can whisper at xeno-artefacts to expel the spirits residing within. Perhaps we should ask them?"
